snippet.title: Usurper - Official Trailer 3
snippet.description:
Usurper is only weeks away! Coming to PC, Mac, and Linux on September 9th, 2024!

Play the Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2347280/Usurper/

Usurper is a turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where your King is your strongest weapon. Play cards from your deck to drop units onto the battlefield and checkmate your opponent. Build your Deck, Upgrade your Ruler, and Claim the Throne.

Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/roguebraingames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/roguebrainstudios/
Website: https://www.roguebrainstudios.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/BPkQVMYQm3
